data.title: Credit Risk Prediction App
data.description: Full-stack credit risk scoring application with Flask API and React frontend
highlights: 15% improvement in prediction accuracy using Random Forest
Flask REST API for real-time scoring
Responsive React frontend with automated data preprocessing

data.title: Customer Churn Prediction
data.description: Machine learning model for predicting customer churn with model explainability
highlights: 12% improvement in classification accuracy using XGBoost
Robust feature engineering and imbalanced dataset handling

data.title: Natural Language to SQL Converter
data.description: AI-powered application converting natural language queries to SQL
highlights: 40% reduction in deployment costs on Azure
30% increase in user engagement with intuitive visualization

data.title: COVID-19 Chest X-Ray Classification
data.description: Deep learning model for COVID-19 detection from medical imaging
highlights: Convolutional Neural Network for image classification
Rapid diagnosis assistance through automated analysis
